005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractLoader;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IConstraintLoader;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyConstraintSet;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyTargetedConstraints;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultConstraintSet;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultScopedContraints;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FieldTargetedConstraints;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FlagTargetedConstraints;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IModelConstrained;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IScopedContraints;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ISource;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ITargetedConstraints;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IValueConstrained;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ValueConstraintSet;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.ConstraintXmlSupport;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlObjectParser;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlObjectParser.Handler;
030import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument;
031import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS.Scope;
032import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
033import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
034
035import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
036import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlCursor;
037import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;
038import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlObject;
039import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;
040import org.apache.xmlbeans.impl.values.XmlValueNotSupportedException;
041
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.net.URI;
044import java.util.Deque;
045import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
046import java.util.LinkedList;
047import java.util.List;
048import java.util.Map;
049import java.util.Set;
050
051import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
052
053import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
054
055/**
056 * Provides methods to load a constraint set expressed in XML.
057 * <p>
058 * Loaded constraint instances are cached to avoid the need to load them for
059 * every use. Any constraint set imported is also loaded and cached
060 * automatically.
061 */
062@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
063public class XmlConstraintLoader
064    extends AbstractLoader<List<IConstraintSet>>
065    implements IConstraintLoader {
066
067  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
068  @NonNull
069  private static final Map<QName,
070      Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>>> SCOPE_OBJECT_MAPPING = ObjectUtils.notNull(
071          Map.ofEntries(
072              Map.entry(new QName(IModule.XML_NAMESPACE, "assembly"),
073                  XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedAssembly),
074              Map.entry(new QName(IModule.XML_NAMESPACE, "field"),
075                  XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedField),
076              Map.entry(new QName(IModule.XML_NAMESPACE, "flag"),
077                  XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedFlag)));
078
079  @NonNull
080  private static final XmlObjectParser<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> SCOPE_PARSER
081      = new XmlObjectParser<>(SCOPE_OBJECT_MAPPING) {
082
083        @Override
084        protected Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> identifyHandler(XmlCursor cursor, XmlObject obj) {
085          Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> retval;
086          if (obj instanceof Scope.Assembly) {
087            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedAssembly;
088          } else if (obj instanceof Scope.Field) {
089            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedField;
090          } else if (obj instanceof Scope.Flag) {
091            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedFlag;
092          } else {
093            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format("Unhandled element type '%s'.", obj.getClass().getName()));
094          }
095          return retval;
096        }
097
098      };
099
100  @Override
101  protected List<IConstraintSet> parseResource(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
102      throws IOException {
103
104    // parse this metaschema
105    METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument xmlObject = parseConstraintSet(resource);
106
107    // now check if this constraint set imports other constraint sets
108    int size = xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS().sizeOfImportArray();
109    Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraints;
110    if (size == 0) {
111      importedConstraints = CollectionUtil.emptySet();
112    } else {
113      try {
114        importedConstraints = new LinkedHashSet<>();
115        for (METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS.Import imported : xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS()
116            .getImportList()) {
117          URI importedResource = URI.create(imported.getHref());
118          importedResource = ObjectUtils.notNull(resource.resolve(importedResource));
119          importedConstraints.addAll(loadInternal(importedResource, visitedResources));
120        }
121      } catch (MetaschemaException ex) {
122        throw new IOException(ex);
123      }
124    }
125
126    // now create this constraint set
127    return CollectionUtil.singletonList(new DefaultConstraintSet(
128        resource,
129        parseScopedConstraints(xmlObject, resource),
130        importedConstraints));
131  }
132
133  /**
134   * Parse the provided XML resource as a Metaschema constraints.
135   *
136   * @param resource
137   *          the resource to parse
138   * @return the XMLBeans representation of the Metaschema contraints
139   * @throws IOException
140   *           if a parsing error occurred
141   */
142  @NonNull
143  private static METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument parseConstraintSet(@NonNull URI resource) throws IOException {
144    try {
145      XmlOptions options = new XmlOptions();
146      options.setBaseURI(resource);
147      options.setLoadLineNumbers();
148      return ObjectUtils.notNull(METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.Factory.parse(resource.toURL(), options));
149    } catch (XmlException ex) {
150      throw new IOException(ex);
151    }
152  }
153
154  /**
155   * Parse individual constraint definitions from the provided XMLBeans object.
156   *
157   * @param xmlObject
158   *          the XMLBeans object
159   * @param resource
160   *          the resource containing the constraint content
161   * @return the scoped constraint definitions
162   */
163  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops") // intentional
164  @NonNull
165  protected List<IScopedContraints> parseScopedConstraints(
166      @NonNull METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument xmlObject,
167      @NonNull URI resource) {
168    List<IScopedContraints> scopedConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
169
170    StaticContext.Builder builder = StaticContext.builder()
171        .baseUri(resource);
172
173    METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS constraints = xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS();
174
175    constraints.getNamespaceBindingList().stream()
176        .forEach(binding -> builder.namespace(
177            ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getPrefix()), ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getUri())));
178
179    builder.useWildcardWhenNamespaceNotDefaulted(true);
180
181    ISource source = ISource.externalSource(builder.build());
182
183    for (Scope scope : constraints.getScopeList()) {
184      assert scope != null;
185
186      List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints = new LinkedList<>(); // NOPMD - intentional
187      try {
188        SCOPE_PARSER.parse(scope, Pair.of(source, targetedConstraints));
189      } catch (MetapathException | XmlValueNotSupportedException ex) {
190        if (ex.getCause() instanceof MetapathException) {
191          throw new MetapathException(
192              String.format("Unable to compile a Metapath in '%s'. %s",
193                  source.getSource(),
194                  ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
195              ex);
196        }
197        throw ex;
198      }
199
200      URI namespace = ObjectUtils.notNull(URI.create(scope.getMetaschemaNamespace()));
201      String shortName = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(scope.getMetaschemaShortName());
202
203      scopedConstraints.add(new DefaultScopedContraints(
204          namespace,
205          shortName,
206          CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(targetedConstraints)));
207    }
208    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(scopedConstraints);
209  }
210
211  private static void handleScopedAssembly( // NOPMD false positive
212      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
213      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
214    Scope.Assembly assembly = (Scope.Assembly) obj;
215
216    IModelConstrained constraints = new AssemblyConstraintSet();
217    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, assembly, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
218
219    state.getRight().add(new AssemblyTargetedConstraints(
220        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(assembly.getTarget()),
221        constraints));
222  }
223
224  private static void handleScopedField( // NOPMD false positive
225      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
226      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
227    Scope.Field field = (Scope.Field) obj;
228
229    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet();
230    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, field, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
231
232    state.getRight().add(new FieldTargetedConstraints(
233        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(field.getTarget()),
234        constraints));
235  }
236
237  private static void handleScopedFlag( // NOPMD false positive
238      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
239      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
240    Scope.Flag flag = (Scope.Flag) obj;
241
242    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet();
243    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, flag, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
244
245    state.getRight().add(new FlagTargetedConstraints(
246        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(flag.getTarget()),
247        constraints));
248  }
249}
